front.title: A Framework for BGP Feedback Message In Segment Routing

abstract.t: In support of Segment Routing(SR), routing protocols advertise a variety of identifiers used to define the segments that direct packet forwarding. In cases where the information advertised by a given protocol instance is either internally inconsistent or conflicts with advertisements from another protocol instance a means of notifying the originator about the inconsistency is required. This document defines a generic mechanism to notify the BGP originator about the inconsistency in the network.
